title: 1,000 Places To See Before You Die
name: 1,000 Places To See Before You Die
description:
A Map by Sarahl56

Based on the traveler's life list by Patricia Schultz

properties.name: 'Iolani Palace
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56364 S. King Street, Honolulu, HI Waikiki and Beyond - The only royal residence on U.S. soil

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56"Poetry in Motion"- experience. This is where the Powell-Hyde and Powell-Mason lines begin. .

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Alta Vista Park
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 2300 Scott St, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Alta Vista Park
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 2300 Scott St, San Francisco, CA"Poetry in Motion"- Go to the top to see a postcard view of the "painted ladies" on the 700 block of Steiner Street.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Chinatown
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Chinatown, San Francisco, CA"Poetry in Motion"- site, experience. The country\'s second largest Chinese enclave.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Coit Tower
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561 Telegraph Hill Blvd, San Francisco, CA"Poetry in Motion"- Tower in the middle of North Beach, the most enjoyable neighborhood to stroll around, offering great views.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Ferry Plaza Farmers' Market
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561 Ferry Building, San Francisco, CA 94111"Poetry in Motion"- experience. The city\'s best and biggest farmers\' market. Open Tuesdays and Saturdays.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Fisherman's Wharf
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5647 Pier # 2, San Francisco, CA 94133"Poetry in Motion"- This is where the Powell-Hyde line ends. Eat cracked crab and fish-and-chips from harborside stands.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- Haight-Ashbury
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Haight-Ashbury, San Francisco, CA"Poetry in Motion"- site, experience. A kind of retirement zone for \'60s hippies.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- The Fairmont
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56950 Mason Street, San Francisco, CA 94108"Poetry in Motion"- hotel. Landmark hotel where Tony Bennett performed. From 89.

properties.name: A Tour on San Francisco's Cable Cars- The Ritz-Carlton
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56600 Stockton St., San Francisco, CA"Poetry in Motion"- hotel. Considered one of the world\'s best. From 50.

properties.name: Alan Wong's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561857 S. King St., Honolulu, HIWaikiki and Beyond - the shrine of Hawaiian regional cuisine.

properties.name: Albuquerque's Balloon Fiesta
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl569201 Balloon Museum Dr NE, Albuquerque, NM The World\'s Most Photographed Event - 9 days in early October.

properties.name: Amelia Island - The Palace Saloon
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56117 Centre Street, Fernandina Beach, FL 32034"Bypassed by Time, Sweetened by Modern-Day Luxury"- Amelia Island- island, town, hotel. Best time - Shrimp Festival, 1st weekend in May.

properties.name: Amelia Island - The Ritz-Carlton
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl564750 Amelia Island Parkway, Amelia Island, FL 32034"Bypassed by Time, Sweetened by Modern-Day Luxury" - island, town, hotel (from 59-59). Restaurant - The Grill (0). Best time is the 1st weekend in May for the Shrimp Festival.

properties.name: Arizona Biltmore Resort & Spa
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl562400 E. Missouri Ave., Phoenix, AZA Wrightian Legend - The only surviving hotel in the world in whose design Frank Lloyd Wright participated.

properties.name: Arthur Bryant's Barbecue
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561727 Brooklyn Avenue, Kansas City, MOA Nationally Acclaimed Culinary Landmark, open at 10:00 a.m.

properties.name: Arthur Bryant's Barbecue - American Royal Livestock Horse Show and Rodeo
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561701 American Royal Court, Kansas City, MO 64102A Nationally Acclaimed Culinary Landmark - Two month show held in autumn, huge bbq competitions

properties.name: Blackberry Farm
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561471 West Millers Cove Road, Walland, TN 37886"High Style in the Smokies"- hotel, restaurant. 45-845, including meals. Best times Oct-Nov for foliage.

properties.name: Canyon Ranch Health Resort
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl568600 E. Rockcliff Road, Tucson, AZA World-Class Wellness Center - a pioneer among co-ed fitness resorts in the U.S.

properties.name: Canyon de Chelly National Monument
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Sacred Outdoor Museum of the Navajo Nation - best known for its multi-storied cliffside dwellings built by the Anasazi between 700-1300 AD.

properties.name: Canyon de Chelly National Monument - Thunderbird Lodge
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Sacred Outdoor Museum of the Navajo Nation - The only accomodations officially within the park

properties.name: Carlsbad Caverns National Park
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56A Natural Subterranean Wonder - Best time is mid-May to Mid-Oct for the bats.

properties.name: Cattlemen's Steakhouse
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561309 S. Agnew, Oklahoma City, OK 73108Where Beef Reigns - In the middle of OK National Stockyards; have the corn-fed sirloin steak.

properties.name: Chez Panisse
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561517 Shattuck Avenue, Berkeley, CA, 94709"The Restaurant That Changed the Way America Eats"- restaurant. Alice Waters. Closed Sunday.

properties.name: Chez Panisse- Zuni Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 1658 Market Street, San Francisco, CA"The Restaurant That Changed the Way America Eats"- briefly mentioned as similar to Chez Panisse. Closed Monday.

properties.name: Death Valley National Park
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 Death Valley, CA 92328"As Low as You Can Get" - site, hotel. 0 per car. Best times Oct-May; dawn and late afternoon for the visual power and play of light.

properties.name: Death Valley National Park - Furnace Creek Inn
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56  "As Low as You Can Get"- site, hotel. Historic inn in death valley. Rates 55-65. Best times Oct-May.

properties.name: Diamond Head
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 Waikiki and Beyond - Requisite tourist activity, great view of Honolulu.

properties.name: Elizabeth on 37th
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56105 East 37th street, savannah, georgia"The Queen of New Southern Cooking" - restaurant; open daily, dinner only (0). Try the Savannah cream cake or the peach and blueberry cobbler.

properties.name: Everglades National Park
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 107 Camellia Street, Everglades City, FL 34139"America\'s Big Swamp" - site, experience. Best way to see is by kayak or canoe. Best times Jan-Mar.

properties.name: Graceland and the Elvis Trail - Beale Street
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Beale Street, Memphis, TN"There\'s No Place Like Home"- site, hotel. Delta blues music scene. Best times: Jan 8 for Elvis\' birthday, the week around August 16 (anniversary of his death), early May for the 3 day Beale Street Music Festival.

properties.name: Graceland and the Elvis Trail - Graceland
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl563765 Elvis Presley Blvd., Memphis, TN 38116"There\'s No Place Like Home"- site, hotel. Mon-Sat 9am-5pm, Sun 10am-4pm; 0.

properties.name: Graceland and the Elvis Trail - Heartbreak Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 3677 Elvis Presley Blvd., Memphis, TN 38116"There\'s No Place Like Home"- site, hotel. From 10.

properties.name: Graceland and the Elvis Trail - Sun Studio
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56706 Union Avenue, Memphis, TN "There\'s No Place Like Home"- site, hotel. Where Elvis cut his first record. Open daily from 10am-6pm. Tours are given every half hour, .50/person.

properties.name: Halekulani
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl562199 Kalia Rd., Honolulu, HIWaikiki and Beyond - The premier hotel in the Hawaiian Islands and one of the best in the U.S. Restaurants: La Mer (great dinner), Orchids (brunch), House Without A Key (beachside- good for sunset)

properties.name: Hanauma Bay
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Waikiki and Beyond - The best snorkeling in all the Hawaiian Islands

properties.name: Hollywood - Grauman's Chinese Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 6925 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028"Where America Invents Itself"- site. Historic theatre- where the footprints and handprints of the stars are.

properties.name: Hollywood - Hollywood Boulevard Walk of Fame
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56"Where America Invents Itself"- site. Mile-long walk honoring over 2,000 stars from 1960 on.

properties.name: Hollywood - Hotel Bel Air
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 701 Stone Canyon Road, Los Angeles, CA 90077"Where America Invents Itself"- hotel. The city\'s finest and most nostalgic venue.

properties.name: Hollywood - Spago
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56176 North Canon Drive, Beverly Hills, CA 90210"Where America Invents Itself"- restaurant. Wolfgang Puck\'s signature pizzas. Open Mon-Sat for lunch and Every night for dinner.

properties.name: Hollywood - Walt Disney Concert Hall
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 135 North Grand Avenue. Los Angeles, CA 90012"Where America Invents Itself"- site. Home of L.A. Philharmonic; designed by Frank Gehry.

properties.name: Hollywood- Musso & Frank Grill
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl566667 Hollywood Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90028"Where America Invents Itself"- restaurant. L.A.\'s oldest restaurant. Have a martini at the bar. Open Tues-Sat 11am-11pm.

properties.name: Hollywood- The Ivy
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56113 N Robertson Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90048"Where America Invents Itself"- restaurant. Outdoor lunch with great star-spotting potential. Open daily.

properties.name: Hotel Del Coronado
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 1500 Orange Avenue, Coronado, CA 92118"A Beachside Dowager"- hotel, experience. Largest oceanfront resort on Pacific Coast, lots of history. Doubles from 90.

properties.name: Hotel Del Coronado- Coronado Beach
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56   Ocean Boulevard, San Diego, CA"A Beachside Dowager"- site. Great beach.

properties.name: Hotel Del Coronado- San Diego Zoo
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 2920 Zoo Drive, San Diego, CA 92112"A Beachside Dowager"- site. World-famous zoo, animals in naturalistic habitats. 3 adult. Fall hours 8am-4pm.

properties.name: Hotel Del Coronado- San Diego Zoo
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 2920 Zoo Drive, San Diego, CA 92112

properties.name: Ihilani Resort and Spa
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5692-1001 Olani Street, Oahu, Hawaii 96707 Waikiki and Beyond - The best escape from big-city glamour, with a roster of 5-star amenities.

properties.name: Inn of the Anasazi
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56113 Washington Avenue, Santa Fe, NMEarthy Elegance Inspired by the "Ancient Ones" - hotel and restaurant.

properties.name: Iowa State Fair
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Carnival, Festival, and Feast: America\'s Most Famous Ag-Extravaganza. 11 days in mid-August.

properties.name: Joe's Stone Crab
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5611 Washington Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139"A South Beach Institution" - restaurant. Have the stone crab and the Key lime pie. Open daily, mid-Oct to mid-May; 0.

properties.name: Kennedy Space Center
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Orsino, FL"A Window on History, A Glimpse of the Future" - site. Includes Visitors Complex, narrated bus tour, Astronaut Hall of Fame. Best time to go- to see a shuttle launch.

properties.name: Key West - Hemingway Home & Museum
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 907 Whitehead Street, Key West, FL 33040"The Charm and Color of America\'s Last Resort" - island, hotel. Museum open every day 9am-5pm. 1.

properties.name: Key West - Mallory Square pier
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561 Whitehead Street, Key West, FL 33040"The Charm and Color of America\'s Last Resort" - island, hotel. Shopping and tourist attractions. Best time is at sunset.

properties.name: Key West - Schooner Wharf
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56202 William Street, Key West, FL 33040"The Charm and Color of America\'s Last Resort" - island, hotel. Best time to go to this bar is during sunset cocktail hour.

properties.name: Key West - Sloppy Joe's
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56201 Duval Street, Key West, FL 33040"The Charm and Color of America\'s Last Resort" - island, hotel. Legendary bar, touristy. Best times - Nov-Easter (Fantasy Fest end of Oct).

properties.name: Key West - The Gardens Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 526 Angela Street, Key West, FL 33040"The Charm and Color of America\'s Last Resort" - island, hotel. Have the key lime beignets for breakfast. 30-35. Best times Nov-Easter (Fantasy Fest end of Oct).

properties.name: Lake Powell
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56A Grand Canyon Filled with Water - America\'s houseboating destination- best equipped marina is Wahweap Marina. Rainbow Bridge is 50 lake miles from Wahweap Marina.

properties.name: Lanikai
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Waikiki and Beyond - Considered one of the best beaches in America, along with Kailua to the west (a classic windsurfing spot)

properties.name: Little Palm Island
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5628500 Overseas Hwy, Little Torch Key, FL"A Sybaritic South Seas Fantasy" - island, hotel. Doubles from 95-050, includes boat transfer from Little Torch Key, beach and watercraft amenities. Best times Jan-May for weather, Jun-Oct for fishing.

properties.name: Little Palm Island - Looe Key National Marine Sanctuary
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5627340 Overseas Hwy, Ramrod Key, FL 33042"A Sybaritic South Seas Fantasy" - island, hotel. This is the last living coral reef in North America - snorkeling/diving. Best times Jan-May for weather; Jun-Oct for fishing.

properties.name: Memphis's Rib Joints - Cozy Corner
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56745 North Parkway, Memphis, TN"Pork Capital of America"- restaurant, event. Open Tues-Sat 10:30am-5pm; 5. Best time 3 days in mid may for Barbecue Cooking Contest.

properties.name: Memphis's Rib Joints - Jim Neely's Interstate Bar-B-Que
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl562265 S. Third St., Memphis, TN 38109"Pork Capital of America"- restaurant, event. Lunch and dinner daily. Best time: Memphis in May festival

properties.name: Memphis's Rib Joints - Peabody Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 149 Union Avenue, Memphis, TN 38103"Pork Capital of America"- restaurant, event. See the parade of ducks every day at 11am or 5pm.

properties.name: Memphis's Rib Joints - Rendevous
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5652 South Second St., Memphis, TN"Pork Capital of America"- restaurant, event. Grilled, dry-rubbed ribs. Closed Sun and Mon; 5. Best time: Memphis in May

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - 17-Mile Drive
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561700 17-Mile Drive, Pacific Grove, CA 93950"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- experience. One of the most stunning roads on either U.S. seaboard. Toll road.

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Carmel Mission
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl563080 Rio Road, Carmel, CA 93923"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- site. Historic HQ for entire mission system in CA. Mission tours from 9:30am-5pm, .

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Carmel-by-the-Sea
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- site. Cute town.

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Hog's Breath Inn
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 San Carlos St & 5th Ave, Carmel, CA 93923"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- restaurant. Fun for a Dirty Harry Burger or a nightcap.

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Mission Ranch
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl5626270 Dolores Street, Carmel, CA 93923"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- hotel, restaurant. Stay for dinner at the ranch dining room. From 00 for hotel.

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Monterey Bay Aquarium
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56886 Cannery Row, Monterey, CA 93940"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- site. 4.95/adult. 9:30am-6pm M-F, 9:30am-8pm Sat and Sun during summer.

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Monterey Jazz Festival
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl562000 Fairground Road, Monterey, CA

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 500 Martin Street, Monterey, CA 93940"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- hotel. 40-450.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56"Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- site. Butterfly Town, U.S.A., resting stop for 10,000 of Monarch butterflies.

properties.name: Monterey Peninsula - Pebble Beach Golf Links
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56  "Sacred Golf, Nature\'s Wonderama, and All That Jazz"- site. One of the most spectacular tournamant class public courses in the world. 75.

properties.name: Mrs. Wilkes's Boarding House
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56107 W. Jones St., Savannah, GA 31401"Quintessential Comfort Food"- restaurant, lunch M-F (3), no reservations (arrive at 10:45). No charge cards.

properties.name: Nashville's Music Scene - Country Music Hall of Fame
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 222 Fifth Avenue South, Nashville, TN 37203"A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. Lots of memorabilia. 0.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 2802 Opryland Drive, Nashville, TN 37214 "A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. Great country performances Fri-Sat, extras in summer months; 6-4.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 Nashville, TN"A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. Annual country music festival - June.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56  8400 Hwy 100, Nashville, TN"A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. Great country ham and egg breakfast. 7am-9pm.

properties.name: Nashville's Music Scene - Ryman Auditorium
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 116 Fifth Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37219"A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. This is the original Grand Ole Opry. Tours daily 9am-4pm.

properties.name: Nashville's Music Scene - The Bluebird Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56  4104 Hillsboro Road, Nashville, TN "A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. Must make reservations.

properties.name: Nashville's Music Scene - Tootsie's Orchid Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 422 Broadway, Nashville, TN 37203"A City That Lives and Breathes Music"- site, event. Legendary lounge, across from Ryman Auditorium (original Grand Ole Opry).

properties.name: North Shore
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 Waikiki and Beyond - Stretches from Haleiwa to Kahuku (including Waimea Bay, Sunset Beach, and the Banzai Pipeline) - the world\'s best surfing during the winter.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56726 Kapahulu Ave, Honolulu, HIWaikiki and Beyond - A favorite local dive featuring island dishes

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56An Enchanting High-Desert Terrain and Its Oasis of Luxury - more than 80 Westerns have been filmed in the surrounding countryside.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56525 Boyton Canyon Road, Sedona, AZAn Enchanting High-Desert Terrain and Its Oasis of Luxury - hotel and excellent restaurant, perfectly insinuated into the desert melieu.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56114 N Main St, Roswell, NMUFO Capital of the World - Wacky UFO museum.

properties.name: Roswell - Roswell UFO Festival
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56912 N Main St, Roswell, NMUFO Capital of the World - convention is over July 4th weekend (July 3 - 6, 2008)

properties.name: Route 66
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Rediscovering the Mother Road - It is in Albuquerque that one of the longest stretches of America\'s quintessential Main Street can still be traced.

properties.name: Route 66 - Blue Swallow Motel

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561000 E. Hwy 66, Gallup, NM, USA 87301Rediscovering the Mother Road - In Gallup, a location-ideal Western film capital from 1929 to 1964.

properties.name: Route 66 - El Vado Motel
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56  2500 Central S.W., Albuquerque, NMRediscovering the Mother Road - Can\'t actually stay at this motel- it was purchased by a developer to be torn down, and the city recently bought it.

properties.name: Roy's Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl566600 Kalanianaole Hwy., Honolulu, HI Waikiki and Beyond - Hawaii\'s biggest success story - local fine dining.

properties.name: Royal Hawaiian
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl562259 Kalakaua Ave., Honolulu, HIWaikiki and Beyond - "Pink Palace of the Pacific", its beachside bar serves the best mai tai in town and its famous Monday Luau is a classic.

properties.name: Sanibel and Captiva Islands - Bailey-Matthews Shell Museum
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 3075 Sanibel-Captiva Road, Sanibel, FL 33957 "Bonanza Beaches for the Shell Happy"- island, site, hotel. The only museum in the country dedicated solely to shells. , open daily 10am-5pm. Best times- Nov-May for weather and bird-watching, May-mid-Jul for tarpon season.

properties.name: Sanibel and Captiva Islands - Boca Grande (Gasparilla Island)
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56131 1st St, Boca Grande, FL"Bonanza Beaches for the Shell Happy"- island, site, hotel. Boca Grande is the capital of tarpon fishing.

properties.name: Sanibel and Captiva Islands - Cabbage Key
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56"Bonanza Beaches for the Shell Happy"- island, site, hotel. 100-acre, down-home, real-life Margaritaville. Best times Nov-May.

properties.name: Sanibel and Captiva Islands - Cayo Costa State Park
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 "Bonanza Beaches for the Shell Happy"-island, site, hotel. Uninhabited barefoot Eden, arguably best shelling. Open daily, 8am-sundown. Honor /person admission fee. Best times Nov-May.

properties.name: Sanibel and Captiva Islands - J.N. Ding Darling National Wildlife Refuge
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 1 Wildlife Drive, Sanibel, FL 33957"Bonanza Beaches for the Shell Happy"- island, site, hotel. Bird-watching at its finest. Closed Fridays, entrance fee is per vehicle. Best times Nov-May for bird watching.

properties.name: Sanibel and Captiva Islands - Useppa Island
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56"Bonanza Beaches for the Shell Happy"- island, site, hotel. Gatsby-esque enclave. Seafood lunches at Collier Inn (also overnight). From 60-70, dinner 5. Best times Nov-May.

properties.name: Savannah's Historic District - Davenport House Museum
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56 324 E. State Street, Savannah, GA 31401"Strolling Through a Romance Novel Set in the Old South"- Museum in Savannah\'s historic district - site; M-Sat 10am-4pm, Sun 1pm-4pm; admission.

properties.name: Savannah's Historic District - The Gastonian
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56220 East Gaston Street, Savannah, GA 31401"Strolling Through a Romance Novel Set in the Old South"- Bed and breakfast in Savannah\'s Historic District- site, hotel. Also has legendary Southern breakfast. Best times to visit Savannah: late March or mid May.

properties.name: South Beach - Cafe Cardozo

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56  525 NW 7th Ave., Crystal River, FL"A Face-to-Face Encounter with Pseudo-Mythical Creatures" - experience. 2 including equipment. Best times Nov-Feb, 8am-12pm.

properties.name: The Golden Isles - The Cloister
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Sea Island, GA"History, Aristocrats, and Splendid Isolation"- Sea Island- island, hotel (from 00). Best times Jan for Bridge Festival, mid-Dec for Big Band Festival.

properties.description: Posted by Sarahl561000 Hampton Point Drive, Little St. Simons Island, GA 31522"History, Aristocrats, and Splendid Isolation"- Little St. Simons Island- island, hotel (from 50). Best time- fall months for best weather.

properties.name: The Grand Canyon
properties.description: Posted by Sarahl56Nature\'s Masterpiece - Speaks for itself. Crown jewel of national park hotels = El Tovar Hotel; mule trips from South Rim lead to Phantom Ranch; North Rim; whitewater rafting in the Colorado River (for all activities- www.grandcanyonlodges.com)

properties.name: The Natchez Trace - Monmouth Plantation
